------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

--keys defaults
distance = 250
distance_old = distance
point_list = {}
list_size = 0
line = 0

time = system.getTime()
pause_counter = 0
help_panel_on_start = false --export
slider_panel_on_start = false --export
paused_script_on_start = false --export

pause_tougle = paused_script_on_start 
help_tougle = help_panel_on_start
panel_slider_on = slider_panel_on_start

--screen
system.showScreen(1)

--clocks
clock_rate = 0.01 --export
unit.setTimer("clock",clock_rate)

--player positions
player_id = unit.getMasterPlayerId()
player_name = database.getPlayer(player_id)
player_pos_start = system.getPlayerWorldPos(player_id)
--player_pos_start = unit.getMasterPlayerRelativePosition()

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

--ADD POINTS TO LIST
if list_size < 4 then
    local d = {}
    local c = system.getPlayerWorldPos(player_id)  
    d.p = vec3(c[1],c[2],c[3])     
    d.r = distance
    point_list[list_size] = d    
    list_size = list_size +  1     
  elseif list_size == 4 then 
    system.print("Ready to Find Node, Press Alt+5")
    --system.print(json.encode(point_list))
end

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

--DELETE POINT FROM LIST
if  list_size > 0 then 
  table.remove(point_list,list_size-1)
  list_size = list_size -1
  --system.print(json.encode(point_list))
else
  point_list = {}
  list_size = 0
  --system.print(json.encode(point_list))
end

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

--pause script
pause_tougle = not pause_tougle
if pause_tougle == false then
   unit.setTimer("clock",clock_rate)
   system.print("EZ Scanner -Resumed-")
end

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

-- TRILATERATE
if list_size == 4 then
    p1 = point_list[0].p
    r1 = point_list[0].r
    p2 = point_list[1].p
    r2 = point_list[1].r
    p3 = point_list[2].p
    r3 = point_list[2].r
    p4 = point_list[3].p
    r4 = point_list[3].r 
    
    result = trilaterate(p1, r1, p2, r2, p3, r3, p4, r4)

    local x = math.floor(result.x)
    local y = math.floor(result.y)
    local z = math.floor(result.z)
    position = xyz_to_pos(x,y,z)   
   
    system.print("┍━━━━━NODE LOCATION━━━━━┑")
    system.print(position)
    system.print("SCRIPT PAUSED | START ALT+8 | EXIT ALT+9")
    system.print("┕━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━┙")

    point_list = {}
    list_size = 0
    pause_tougle =  true
    
else
    system.print("need more points to trilaterate")    
end

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

-- EXIT
system.print("Exiting Juvenius' EZ Scaner")
unit.exit()

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0

------------------------------------------------------


--activate help window
help_tougle = not help_tougle

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------

local mouse = system.getThrottleInputFromMouseWheel()

if distance ~= (distance + mouse)then
     local delta = round(system.getTime()-time,2)
     time = system.getTime()

    
     local factor = 1 
 	if delta < 0.08 then factor = 2 end 
     if delta < 0.04 then factor = 20 end  
     
     local d = distance + factor * mouse

	if d > 400 then
  		   distance = 400
		elseif d < 0 then 
             distance = 0
		else 
             distance = round(d,0)
	end
end

------------------------------------------------------
-- DU EZ Script by  
-- Version: 1.0
-- Author: Juvenius Drakonius (discord: Juvenius#231)
------------------------------------------------------


function animate() 
    local c = round(system.getTime(),0)% 10
    if c == 0 then p = "<text style='color:#eca943'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 1 then p = "<text style='color:#498aff'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 2 then p = "<text style='color:#eca943'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 3 then p = "<text style='color:#498aff'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 4 then p = "<text style='color:#eca943'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 5 then p = "<text style='color:#498aff'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 6 then p = "<text style='color:#eca943'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 7 then p = "<text style='color:#498aff'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 8 then p = "<text style='color:#eca943'>￭</text>" end
    if c == 9 then p = "<text style='color:#498aff'>￭</text>" end
    return p
end    

-- distance horizontal line transform 
function distance_line_transform(x)
  y = 0.02 + 0.253*x + -1.13E-04*x^2    
  return y
end
-- make pos
function xyz_to_pos (x,y,z)
    p = [[::pos{0,0,]] ..
    tostring(x) .. ',' .. 
    tostring(y) .. ',' .. 
    tostring(z) .. '}';
    return p
  end

--round funcion
function round(num, numDecimalPlaces)
  if numDecimalPlaces and numDecimalPlaces>0 then
    local mult = 10^numDecimalPlaces
    return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult
  end
  return math.floor(num + 0.5)
end

--trilaterate funcion
function trilaterate(p1, r1, p2, r2, p3, r3, p4, r4)
    local r1s, r2s, r3s = r1*r1, r2*r2, r3*r3  
    local v2 = p2 - p1
    local ax = v2:normalize()
    local U = v2:len()
    local v3 = p3 - p1
    local ay = (v3 - v3:project_on(ax)):normalize()
    local v3x, v3y = v3:dot(ax), v3:dot(ay)
    local vs = v3x*v3x + v3y*v3y
    local az = ax:cross(ay)  
    local x = (r1s - r2s + U*U) / (2*U) 
    local y = (r1s - r3s + vs - 2*v3x*x)/(2*v3y)
    local m = r1s - (x^2) - (y^2) 
    if m < 0.0000001 then m = 0 end
    local z = math.sqrt(m)
    local t1 = p1 + ax*x + ay*y + az*z
    local t2 = p1 + ax*x + ay*y - az*z
  
    if math.abs((p4 - t1):len() - r4) < math.abs((p4 - t2):len() - r4) then
      return t1
    else
      return t2
    end
  end
